==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*{{Lang|Nostoi|grc=Νόστοι|grc_rm=nóstoi}} also known as Returns or Returns of the Greeks, is a lost epic of ancient Greek literature, which recounted the tales of various Greek kings, except Odysseus, whose journey was recounted in the ''Odyssey'', as they journeyed home after the fall of Troy.
